summary.span: Base class for controls that can switch states, such as .

span.span: Base class for controls that can switch states, such as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 屬性指定的狀態。The property specifies the state of the . 屬性會指定是否有兩個或三個狀態。The property specifies whether the has two or three states. ## 自訂 ToggleButton 控制項Customizing the ToggleButton Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[ToggleButton Syles 和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-syles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToggleButton Syles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/togglebutton-syles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響如果該屬性會出現在按鈕控制項的預設範本，並使用的設定。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in Button control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項是繼承自時，這個值會決定其行為`null`。A control that inherits from determines its behavior when this property is `null`. ## 核取方塊CheckBox 當屬性設為 true，讓使用者可以按一下挑選三種可能狀態。When the property is set to true, a user can click a to pick three possible states. 下表說明的三個狀態。The following table describes the three states of a . |狀態 State of the | 的值Value of | |------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------| |已核取Checked|`true`| |若未選取Unchecked|`false`| |不定Indeterminate|`null`| 如果為 false，您可以仍然以程式設計方式將此屬性`null`放置處於不定狀態，但使用者無法設定未決狀態透過[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]。If is false, you can still programmatically set this property to `null` to put the in an indeterminate state, but the user cannot set the to the indeterminate state through the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]. ## RadioButtonRadioButton 如果您將此屬性設定為`null`上、為未選取狀態。If you set this property to `null` on a , the is unchecked. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* `IsChecked`=""/><*object* `IsChecked`=""/> \-或-\- or - <*物件* `IsChecked`="{[X:null 標記延伸](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/ ><*object* `IsChecked`="{[x:Null Markup Extension](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-null-markup-extension.md)}"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例會建立設為未決狀態。The following example creates a set to an indeterminate state. [!code-xaml[CheckBox_Snippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CheckBox_Snippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)]
